headline: TDK-LAMBDA GENESYS DC POWER SUPPLY 5000 WATT
categories.lvl2: Test & Measurement Equipment  >  Power Supplies > DC Power Supplies
specstable:
Manufacturer TDK-Lambda
Model GEN 300-17IS510
Maximum Output Voltage 300.00 Volts
Maximum Output Current 17.00 Amps
Maximum Output Power 5.00 kW
Regulation Modes Constant Current Constant Voltage
Panel Meters Digital
Interface RS 485
Interface 2 RS 232
Control Type Programmable
External Cooling Forced Air Cooled
Other Information


Has ISOLATED ANALOG PROGRAMMING OPTION IS510, can be removed, REQUEST removal when ordering if you need to use all J1 pins!

When the Isolated Analog Option is installed, do not apply any signals to the
non-isolated VPGM and IPGM (J1-9 and J1-10) pins. All other J1 features
may be used normally. Refer to Section 4.5 for a description of J1 features.

Control via front panel, the serial communication port or remote analog port
Part number:0051073
The following parameters can be programmed /
monitored via the serial communication port:
1. Output Voltage setting.
2. Output Current setting.
3. Output Voltage measurement.
4. Output On/Off control.
5. Output Current measurement.
6. Foldback protection setting
7. Over-voltage protection setting and readback.
8. Under-Voltage limit setting and readback.
9. Power-supply start up mode (Auto-restart or Safe-start mode).

Manual is here: https://product.tdk.com/info/en/products/power/tec_data/ps_system_genesys.html

Power Requirements 190-250 V 18.0 A 50/60 Hz 3 Phase
CE Marked YES
Exterior Dimensions
Width 19.000 in (48.3 cm)
Depth 22.000 in (55.9 cm)
Height 3.500 in (8.9 cm)
